#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
int wert(int k);

main()
{
int fall, k;

cin >> fall;
while(fall--)
	{
	cin >> k;
	wert(k);
	}

return 0;
}

int wert(int k)
{
if(k==0)
	cout << "a" << endl;
else if(k==1)
	cout << "ba" << endl;
else if(k==2)
	cout << "cba" << endl;
else if(k==3)
	cout << "dcba" << endl;
else if(k==4)
	cout << "edcba" << endl;
else if(k==5)
	cout << "fedcba" << endl;
else if(k==6)
	cout << "gfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==7)
	cout << "hgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==8)
	cout << "ihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==9)
	cout << "jihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==10)
	cout << "kjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==11)
	cout << "lkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==12)
	cout << "mlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==13)
	cout << "nmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==14)
	cout << "onmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==15)
	cout << "ponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==16)
	cout << "qponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==17)
	cout << "rqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==18)
	cout << "srqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==19)
	cout << "tsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==20)
	cout << "utsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==21)
	cout << "vutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==22)
	cout << "wvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==23)
	cout << "xwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==24)
	cout << "yxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==25)
	cout << "zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==26)
	cout << "bazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==27)
	cout << "cbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==28)
	cout << "dcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==29)
	cout << "edcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==30)
	cout << "fedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==31)
	cout << "gfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==32)
	cout << "hgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==33)
	cout << "ihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==34)
	cout << "jihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==35)
	cout << "kjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==36)
	cout << "lkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==37)
	cout << "mlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==38)
	cout << "nmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==39)
	cout << "onmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==40)
	cout << "ponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==41)
	cout << "qponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==42)
	cout << "rqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==43)
	cout << "srqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==44)
	cout << "tsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==45)
	cout << "utsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==46)
	cout << "vutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==47)
	cout << "wvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==48)
	cout << "xwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==49)
	cout << "yxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==50)
	cout << "zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==51)
	cout << "bazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==52)
	cout << "cbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==53)
	cout << "dcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==54)
	cout << "edcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==55)
	cout << "fedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==56)
	cout << "gfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==57)
	cout << "hgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==58)
	cout << "ihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==59)
	cout << "jihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==60)
	cout << "kjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==61)
	cout << "lkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==62)
	cout << "mlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==63)
	cout << "nmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==64)
	cout << "onmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==65)
	cout << "ponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==66)
	cout << "qponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==67)
	cout << "rqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==68)
	cout << "srqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==69)
	cout << "tsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==70)
	cout << "utsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==71)
	cout << "vutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==72)
	cout << "wvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==73)
	cout << "xwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==74)
	cout << "yxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==75)
	cout << "zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==76)
	cout << "bazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==77)
	cout << "cbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==78)
	cout << "dcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==79)
	cout << "edcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==80)
	cout << "fedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==81)
	cout << "gfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==82)
	cout << "hgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==83)
	cout << "ihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==84)
	cout << "jihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==85)
	cout << "kjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==86)
	cout << "lkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==87)
	cout << "mlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==88)
	cout << "nmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==89)
	cout << "onmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==90)
	cout << "ponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==91)
	cout << "qponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==92)
	cout << "rqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==93)
	cout << "srqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==94)
	cout << "tsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==95)
	cout << "utsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==96)
	cout << "vutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==97)
	cout << "wvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==98)
	cout << "xwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==99)
	cout << "yxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
else if(k==100)
	cout << "zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcbazyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba" << endl;
	
return 0;
}
